Module schiffeversenken

Package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents

package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents
This package contains home made GUI components. Yes - There are premade ones with every GUI toolkit but it may be interesting for students to have a look at these as they don't contain multiple thousand lines of code for mostly not required features.
Author:
leondietrich
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine
    This package contains all the classes that should be hidden from the user
    de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.utilityscenes
    This package contains scenes that are not really part of the game.

    This controller automatically prepares your components for rendering.

    Use this class to draw components

    Use this interface to make your component drawable.

    This component allows you to select different items when you click on them.

    This class represents a list box.
    MaskedTextBox
    This class is a text box that only allows the input of text that matches the given mask pattern.

    This class represents a text label
